name: Click on object- Asset
description:
With this little prefab you can configure a gameobject with clickable capability (using the mouse pointer), with which you can interacy and get a displayable interface (like text, for example).

For more information on how to configure it and a little tutorial about it, visit--

http://creasoulness.tk/unity-3d-systems-tutorials/clickable-object-system-para-unity-3d/
